name: Bullet Time (Hugo Lopez, Ále Acevedo, Gun Game (Alex Huang))
name_original: Bullet Time (Hugo Lopez, Ále Acevedo, Gun Game (Alex Huang))
description:
Bullet Time is a prototype game my team and I made for a class project. The theme is time travel in that it's a 1 vs 1 where both players try to shoot each other. The catch? After a certain amount of time, both players get rewinded back to a previous position and must resort to a combination of strategy and luck to defeat their opponent.

 Player 1 is blue - WASD & G

Player 2 is red - Arrow Keys & M
